content:
Is there a language-agnostic library for Lean to model the behaviour of imperative programs? For example, it could have some kind of "sandboxed" IO monad to model world interactions and race conditions.

I'm interested in using such a library to verify concurrent data structures.

@Leni Aniva I would look (and maybe ask more) in #Program verification. There is https://github.com/leanprover-community/iris-lean, but I don't know much about it. There is a bit of discussion in #Program verification > Is anyone else working on Iris in Lean? about it's current status.
And maybe also see #Program verification > Concurrent and distributed programs.
Leni Aniva has marked this topic as resolved.
